articles.title: Hologram doctors beamed to space station to visit astronauts - Space.com
articles.description: You read that right, a hologram doctor.
articles.content:
NASA flight surgeon Dr. Josef Schmid "holoported" to the ISS in October, 2021 to visit the astronauts on board.  (Image credit: ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Thomas Pesquet)

articles.title: NASA and SpaceX Delay Crew-4 Launch to International Space Station - SciTechDaily
